post.description: Creates a new user and returns a JWT token

id.description: The unique identifier for the booking.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who made the booking.

id.description: The unique identifier for the booking.

place_id.description: The ID of the booked place.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who made the booking.

start_date.description: The start date of the booking.

end_date.description: The end date of the booking.

start_time.description: The start time of the booking.

description.example: A large auditorium suitable for conferences and big events.

capacity.description: The maximum capacity of the place.

type.description: The type of place (e.g., auditorium, conference room).

default_hours.description: The default operational hours of the place.

default_days.description: The default operational days of the place.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available places.

post.description: Create a new place. Only accessible by admins.

403.description: Unauthorized. Only admins can create places.

get.summary: Get a specific place by ID
get.description: Retrieve detailed information of a specific place using its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the place to retrieve

put.summary: Update a specific place by ID
put.description: Update the details of a specific place. Only admins can perform this action.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the place to update

403.description: Unauthorized. Only admins can update places.

delete.summary: Delete a specific place by ID
delete.description: Delete a place from the system. Only admins can perform this action.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the place to delete

403.description: Unauthorized. Only admins can delete places.

get.description: Filter places based on type, capacity, and availability dates and times.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Space type (Ej: oficina, sala de reuniones, etc.)
